title: Dragon's Journey
description: Dragon has left the closet and can finally see the sky. Now heâ€™s flying north to help Orin face his monsters and defeat his family curse. A big storm and terrifying monsters like Orin and Dragon have never seen await them both. Will his Nana find them in time to save them from these horrors? The Dragon in The Closet is a thrilling comic book series for kids full of magic and mystery.
author: Carolyn Watson-Dubisch
